turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel.
turn.1: What film was shot at the Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel?
turn.2: Other television shows shot at the hotel include "Knots Landing", "Moonlighting" and "Curb Your Enthusiasm".
turn.3: Did any musical artist perform at the hotel?
turn.4: Prince performed five shows at the hotel in 2007, which included dinner with his personal chef, a two-hour performance and a post-set jazz jam.
turn.5: Was the hotel ever used as a film set?
turn.6: The TV series "Lucifer_" frequently includes exterior views of the hotel in establishing shots.
turn.7: Was the rooftop used for filming?
turn.8: A scene between Lucifer and Amenadiel in the first season episode "Take Me Back to Hell" takes place on the roof, with the back of the Roosevelt's sign visible.
turn.9: Did any famous person stay at the hotel?
turn.10: Marilyn Monroe lived at the hotel for two years early in her career, and posed for her first commercial photography shoot by the pool.
turn.11: Who did Monroe meet at the hotel?
turn.12: She and Arthur Miller were said to have met at the hotel's Cinegrill nightclub.
